018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import java.io.BufferedReader;
021import java.io.InputStreamReader;
022import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
023import java.net.Socket;
024import java.net.URL;
025import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
026import java.nio.file.Path;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.logging.Logger;
029import java.util.regex.Matcher;
030import java.util.regex.Pattern;
031
032/**
033 * Discovers running H2 log servers that match a specific database path.
034 *
035 * <p>This class scans the actor-IaC reserved port range (29090-29100) and uses the
036 * HTTP info API (TCP port - 200) to find servers that are serving a specific database.</p>
037 *
038 * <p><strong>Discovery Flow:</strong></p>
039 * <pre>
040 * 1. Check if target DB file exists
041 * 2. Scan HTTP ports 28890-28900 for /info API
042 * 3. Compare db_path from API with target path
043 * 4. Return matching server's TCP port if found
044 * </pre>
045 *
046 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
047 * @since 2.11.0
048 */
049public class LogServerDiscovery {
050
051    private static final Logger LOG = Logger.getLogger(LogServerDiscovery.class.getName());
052
053    /** TCP port range for H2 servers */
054    private static final int TCP_PORT_START = 29090;
055    private static final int TCP_PORT_END = 29100;
056
057    /** Offset from TCP port to HTTP port (TCP - 200 = HTTP) */
058    private static final int HTTP_PORT_OFFSET = -200;
059
060    /** Connection timeout in milliseconds */
061    private static final int CONNECT_TIMEOUT = 1000;
062
063    /** Read timeout in milliseconds */
064    private static final int READ_TIMEOUT = 1000;
065
066    /**
067     * Result of a server discovery attempt.
068     */
069    public static class DiscoveryResult {
070        private final boolean found;
071        private final int tcpPort;
072        private final int httpPort;
073        private final String dbPath;
074        private final String version;
075        private final int sessionCount;
076
077        private DiscoveryResult(boolean found, int tcpPort, int httpPort,
078                               String dbPath, String version, int sessionCount) {
079            this.found = found;
080            this.tcpPort = tcpPort;
081            this.httpPort = httpPort;
082            this.dbPath = dbPath;
083            this.version = version;
084            this.sessionCount = sessionCount;
085        }
086
087        public static DiscoveryResult notFound() {
088            return new DiscoveryResult(false, -1, -1, null, null, -1);
089        }
090
091        public static DiscoveryResult found(int tcpPort, int httpPort,
092                                            String dbPath, String version, int sessionCount) {
093            return new DiscoveryResult(true, tcpPort, httpPort, dbPath, version, sessionCount);
094        }
095
096        public boolean isFound() { return found; }
097        public int getTcpPort() { return tcpPort; }
098        public int getHttpPort() { return httpPort; }
099        public String getDbPath() { return dbPath; }
100        public String getVersion() { return version; }
101        public int getSessionCount() { return sessionCount; }
102
103        public String getServerAddress() {
104            return "localhost:" + tcpPort;
105        }
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Discovers a running log server that matches the given database path.
110     *
111     * @param targetDbPath the database path to match (without .mv.db extension)
112     * @return discovery result containing server info if found
113     */
114    public DiscoveryResult discoverServer(Path targetDbPath) {
115        String targetPathStr = targetDbPath.toAbsolutePath().toString();
116        LOG.fine("Searching for log server with db_path: " + targetPathStr);
117
118        // Scan HTTP ports for matching server
119        for (int tcpPort = TCP_PORT_START; tcpPort <= TCP_PORT_END; tcpPort++) {
120            int httpPort = tcpPort + HTTP_PORT_OFFSET;
121
122            Optional<ServerInfo> info = queryServerInfo(httpPort);
123            if (info.isPresent()) {
124                ServerInfo serverInfo = info.get();
125                LOG.fine("Found server at port " + tcpPort + " with db_path: " + serverInfo.dbPath);
126
127                // Compare paths
128                if (pathsMatch(targetPathStr, serverInfo.dbPath)) {
129                    LOG.info("Auto-detected log server at localhost:" + tcpPort +
130                            " (db: " + serverInfo.dbPath + ")");
131                    return DiscoveryResult.found(
132                            tcpPort, httpPort,
133                            serverInfo.dbPath,
134                            serverInfo.version,
135                            serverInfo.sessionCount
136                    );
137                }
138            }
139        }
140
141        LOG.fine("No matching log server found for: " + targetPathStr);
142        return DiscoveryResult.notFound();
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Queries server info from the HTTP API.
147     */
148    private Optional<ServerInfo> queryServerInfo(int httpPort) {
149        try {
150            // First check if port is open
151            try (Socket socket = new Socket("localhost", httpPort)) {
152                socket.setSoTimeout(CONNECT_TIMEOUT);
153            }
154
155            // Query the /info API
156            URL url = new URL("http://localhost:" + httpPort + "/info");
157            HttpURLConnection conn = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
158            conn.setConnectTimeout(CONNECT_TIMEOUT);
159            conn.setReadTimeout(READ_TIMEOUT);
160            conn.setRequestMethod("GET");
161
162            if (conn.getResponseCode() == 200) {
163                try (BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(
164                        new InputStreamReader(conn.getInputStream(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8))) {
165                    StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder();
166                    String line;
167                    while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
168                        json.append(line);
169                    }
170
171                    String jsonStr = json.toString();
172                    ServerInfo info = new ServerInfo();
173                    info.dbPath = extractJsonString(jsonStr, "db_path");
174                    info.version = extractJsonString(jsonStr, "version");
175                    info.sessionCount = extractJsonInt(jsonStr, "session_count");
176                    return Optional.of(info);
177                }
178            }
179        } catch (Exception e) {
180            // Server not available or not responding
181            LOG.finest("No server at HTTP port " + httpPort + ": " + e.getMessage());
182        }
183        return Optional.empty();
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Compares two paths for equality, handling different path formats.
188     */
189    private boolean pathsMatch(String path1, String path2) {
190        if (path1 == null || path2 == null) {
191            return false;
192        }
193
194        // Normalize paths for comparison
195        try {
196            Path p1 = Path.of(path1).toAbsolutePath().normalize();
197            Path p2 = Path.of(path2).toAbsolutePath().normalize();
198            return p1.equals(p2);
199        } catch (Exception e) {
200            // Fall back to string comparison
201            return path1.equals(path2);
202        }
203    }
204
205    /**
206     * Extracts a string value from JSON.
207     */
208    private String extractJsonString(String json, String key) {
209        String pattern = "\"" + key + "\"\\s*:\\s*\"([^\"]+)\"";
210        Pattern p = Pattern.compile(pattern);
211        Matcher m = p.matcher(json);
212        return m.find() ? m.group(1) : null;
213    }
214
215    /**
216     * Extracts an integer value from JSON.
217     */
218    private int extractJsonInt(String json, String key) {
219        String pattern = "\"" + key + "\"\\s*:\\s*(\\d+)";
220        Pattern p = Pattern.compile(pattern);
221        Matcher m = p.matcher(json);
222        return m.find() ? Integer.parseInt(m.group(1)) : -1;
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Internal class to hold server info from API.
227     */
228    private static class ServerInfo {
229        String dbPath;
230        String version;
231        int sessionCount;
232    }
233}
